name: PaintGame
description:
PaintGame is a painting game which you have the three primary colors and you have to recreate the basic painting.

Controls

Left click - Paint
N - Go to next level 
Q - Quit game

How play ?

The large square, on the left, represents the drawing you are doing.
The four squares, on the right side of the screen, correspond to :

  • the drawing to be made,
  • a square of green paint,
  • a square of red paint,
  • a square of blue paint.
